displayName.title: My Display Name
displayName.description: The name to show to other meeting participants

email.title: My Email
email.description: The email address to show to other meeting participants. If this address is registered at gravatar.com, your custom icon will be shown

configOverwrite.title: Jitsi Config Overwrite
configOverwrite.description: a customized [Jitsi Configuration](https://github.com/jitsi/jitsi-meet/blob/master/config.js). The default is as conservative as possible.

interfaceConfigOverwrite.title: Jitsi Interface Configuration
interfaceConfigOverwrite.description: a customized [Jitsi Interface Configuration](https://github.com/jitsi/jitsi-meet/blob/master/interface_config.js). The default is fairly conservative. Known hidden buttons: recording, livestreaming, etherpad, invite, download. Known hidden config: calendar.
